news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Hohm Energy, a South African cleantech firm, secured an $8 million seed funding to enhance rooftop solar adoption. The investment, led by E3 Capital and 4DX Ventures, aims to improve solar access by connecting homeowners and businesses with solar installers and finance options amidst a backdrop of power cuts.

overview_description.description:
Hohm Energy is an online marketplace that connects customers with accredited solar providers, product suppliers, and financiers. It provides clients with an evolving solar purchasing experience by utilizing scalable technology that manages their entire solar transition journey from scoping for the solution, installation, ongoing operations, and maintenance.

The company was founded in 2021 and is headquartered in Gauteng, South Africa.

properties.growth_insight_description: Hohm Energy secured $8 million in seed funding to scale the adoption of rooftop solar across South Africa. The company also received R153 million in funding to further invest in solar initiatives.

about_short_description.short_description: Hohm Energy is an online marketplace that connects customers with accredited solar providers, product suppliers, and financiers.

product.name: Solar System Kits
product.description: Hohm Energy offers solar system kits tailored to different electricity consumption levels, including Flash Plus, Spark Plus, Glow, and Shine, each providing a minimum backup duration.

product.name: Solar Subscription
product.description: A rental option for solar solutions where maintenance and insurance are covered by Hohm Energy, without the need for ownership.

product.name: Outright Purchase
product.description: Customers can buy solar kits outright, owning the equipment from day one with a straightforward purchasing process.

product.name: Solar Finance
product.description: Financing options similar to vehicle finance, allowing customers to pay off their solar system over 72 months.

product.name: Home Loan Option
product.description: Customers can add the cost of their solar system to their monthly bond repayments, offering a lower interest rate and premium.

product.name: Installation Services
product.description: Hohm Energy provides installation services for solar systems, ensuring compliance with rigorous standards.
